name: General Nevar
Text: 'Adds 2 to the power of anything he pilots (3 if Blizzard 2.) Deploys -1 on Hoth. Once per game, may deploy a marker site with < 2 [Dark Side] or a battleground (except Endor system or a war room). Once per game, if piloting at a site where no characters present, may peek at opponent''s hand.',
